1: Yes, usually. Legislation is usually passed with the approval of the upper chamber of the

citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: In practice, is the approval of the upper chamber of the legislature required to pass legislation?
